title: The CIA
description: Jeremy Davis was only five when fell into an old tunnel left over from WWII. The tunnel was flooded with water and chemicals that were used to alter peoples’ DNA in hopes of making a Master Race. Chemicals that only became stronger over time. Jeremy was forever altered and has gained amazing powers to gather energy from every living thing. Blood Tithe III, The CIA takes you through the CIA’s prospective as they hunt down Jeremy and the other altered ones. Godfrey Ricker, the lead agent, is notorious for his skills and warrior like attitude. Will Jeremy be able to win over the very man that caused so much pain for his new family? All this is going on while the most evil altered one, Conrad, has freed his gang, who have all made a Blood Tithe with him. They have one goal, revenge. Jeremy, teamed up with his girl friend Jessica, must find a way to stop him at the same time.
author: Glenn J. Soucy
